Description: Welcome to the sale of yet another cheeky Japanese made Martin replica. Yet unlike the others in the crowd, this particular company made quite literal copies that sound way above and beyond most. Made in Nagoya, Japan forty years ago by high class builder - Hayashi. These lively guitars have a cult following today and we have many professional musicians on our books that gig these guitars. With a certain sense of audacity, this one has the 'C.F Mountain' branding, much to C.F Martins' amusement no doubt - has more character and tone than many real D18's, no question. ∞ Professionally refurbished and set up ∞ Action good, nice to play ∞ Bridge system installed to preserve bridge and soundboard ∞ Excellent mojo with a superb depth of tone ∞ Structure, neck and frets in great shape ∞ Cosmetics showing expected traces of use of 40 years, not mint but cool We have owned, played and restored most of the C.F Mountain models and they all make for great guitars, many gig these and leave the Martin at home, even just for the wry humour, these are just great guitars to have around. 🎼 Pro refurb 🎼 Free UK+EU Ship (USA discounted as priced) 🎼 70's classic blaster Enjoy! For more photo's please find our shop on Reverb.com Best regards afterlife acoustics
Title: 🎼 Rare Japanese Acoustic Guitar (Hayashi Made Martin D18 Style Beauty!) 🎼
ConditionDescription: Luthier Refurbished + Set Up (Good Vintage Condition)
